name: suction-cups
short_effect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
